lenders.occupational_info: I sell advertising in parking garages all over the USA, as well as giant double decker buses and trolleys here in Chicago via The Chicago Trolley & Double Decker Bus Company. lenders.name: Megan

I read Banker to the Poor by Muhammed Yunus and got very excited about how Microcredit could help people improve their lives.

When I found out about Kiva and how it creates an opportunity to allow individuals to have a direct impact on the lives of others around the world I knew that I had to get involved.

lenders.name: carol

lenders.name: Liz

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by others' efforts to make their own way way in the world, inspired by their initiative and strength in the face of adversity, and their efforts to lend a hand to each other. lenders.occupational_info: My work is focused on improving safety for people in transportation systems.

I do this because I care, because I believe and because I respect.... you can to.

lenders.loan_because: There is no excuse not to!

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because:
Financial prosperity, and success in business or personal life is external evidence of God's favor.


"But you shall remember the LORD your God, for it is He who is giving you power to make wealth, that He may confirm His covenant which He swore to your fathers, as it is this day" (Deuteronomy 8:18)
lenders.occupational_info: I handle the sales and service of surgical instruments used in the hospital operating room.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: It bridges the gap.  It is what I can offer and a way to bring about change (and joy).
lenders.occupational_info: Social entrepreneurship in the making.

lenders.name: Rajesh
lenders.loan_because: I need a HD Professional camera for shooting my own films and rent somebody looking for make films.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently working as web designer in an Indian company based in Dubai. My ambition is making film. I have 8 years experience in film industry.

lenders.name: Samuel
lenders.loan_because:
1.) We Are All One
2.) There is Enough (money, love, compassion, abundance, life, you name it).
3.) I define "wealth" as access and happiness. By this I mean that most of the money in the world just sits in a bank account or a vault somewhere going unused and unaccessible to most people and I see Kiva as a great tool that gives more people "access" to this medium which allows them to become self-reliant. This is all done in the spirit of "cooperation," "use," and "oneness of all life." Cheers to Kiva and organizations like it. Namasté
lenders.occupational_info: I currently work as a radiographer, which basically means I am a health-care worker who takes x-rays and cat-scans of people in a clinical setting.

lenders.name: GarryWW
lenders.loan_because: The world is so interconnected that when I loan to others, in reality, I loan to myself ! And 'myself' wants to live in a more ballanced world!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people that have an intellectual disability and require 24hr support in their everyday life. Creating a more fulfilling lifestyle and social structure on their behalf.

lenders.name: Otto/Lill-Ann
lenders.loan_because: It allows us to connect with other people all around the world, in a way that's based on mutual dignity.

lenders.name: Tobias
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who need it.

lenders.name: Christine & Lukas
lenders.loan_because: it is one way to show our respect & support for others

lenders.name: jessica
lenders.loan_because: I want people to have a real chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently going to school to become a theatre teacher.

lenders.name: Marisol and Maneesh
lenders.loan_because: I am happy to have the opportunity to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I design clothes by researching what people are wearing, choosing fabric, and designing what the actual garment looks like. I work with pattern makers, sewers, and buyers to make sure they look right! I work with people locally and internationally.

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: I can share.
lenders.occupational_info: Besides studying to be a medical research analist, I work in a laboratory testing food-products for micro-organisms. My task is to count the bacteria, yeasts and molds in food products, but also determine if there is legionella present in water samples.

lenders.name: mary
lenders.loan_because: My bussiness shows signs of improvement but i have no capital..I have many customers but always have shortage.I am an orphan and i am really in need of help so that i can continue with the bussiness
lenders.occupational_info: I buy foodstuff and supply to the urban markets.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I love feeling the connection of helping others around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social worker and chemical dependency counselor.  I have strong interests in Motivational Interviewing and cognitive therapy.  I love working with persons with severe mental illness and substance abuse problems.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I believe that their is nothing more powerful than enabling people to learn and work.  For those less fortunate, who cannot obtain loans through conventional ways because they do not have a steady job or property to their name, being able to start their own business and potentially be able to sustain their families thanks to loans from entities like Kiva, is an amazing opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: Perrywinkles Kids designs girls' dresses, specializing in the lost art of hand-smocking.  We are based in Toronto, Canada and our dresses are manufactured in Lima, Peru.  We visit our manufacturers on a regular basis and we  are committed to providing a socially-conscious product.

lenders.loan_because: What's $50 gonna buy me these days?   I can't even fill my gas tank.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.occupational_info: I inspect restaurants and hotels to ensure that they are following good health practices.

lenders.name: Tyrone
lenders.loan_because: opportunities like this -to help a complete stranger- that will enhance an individual's life, family well-being and potentially an entire community should be embraced.
lenders.occupational_info: I serve people on a daily basis in the food service industry. I make people's stomaches (and sometimes their day) very happy. I love my line of work.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.occupation: Sr. Financial Analyst and Seminary Student

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: My wonderful cousin Tom gifted me the account.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in advertising, where my job is to make things look beautiful.

lenders.occupational_info: Five Blocks offers Digital Brand Alignment and Reputation Management services to brands internationally. We are different because we use probably the richest data set possible to guide our work.

lenders.loan_because: I want to support women and I can!

lenders.loan_because: I created a club in our high school called S.T.E.P (Students Trying to End Poverty) and are focusing on microfinancing as a way to help people out of poverty.

lenders.name: Sunil
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to see a better world with more human efforts and by helping each other.

lenders.occupational_info: Do not work.

lenders.name: Brooke
lenders.loan_because: so I can help people make money to support their families.  I want their kids to have a happy life.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school and learn lots of things from my teacher.  I also get to play with my friends there.  I hope some of my teachers and friends will join kiva and help other, too!

lenders.name: cynthia
lenders.loan_because: if everyone helped someone else in need, we'd live in the world as God intended & eventually, no one would be needy anymore. Can you even imagine?

lenders.loan_because: I love people and want to see them succeed.

lenders.name: Genni
lenders.loan_because: a small loan can make a big difference.

lenders.name: Jon & Jen
lenders.loan_because: I remember how hard it was getting my first loan. I remember how excited I was when someone took a chance and helped me out.

lenders.name: bobby
lenders.loan_because: i have been work in this Bussisnes almost for 2 years, but because i dont have much money till now my studio just runing in my room, so i registered to kiva hopelly i have got a loan. So i can make my own studio in Jakarta.  I prefer to open a tattoo studio because if i still work in my room is to risk about a sterillitation place, till now if i had finish my job i must clean all of my room with disinfectant, beside that if i have my own studio i can more work easilly and get more client.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is a tattoo and piercing artist, where is about make a beautiful tattoo, and i want to make people understand today tattoo is not for a criminal, it;s just about art in our skin. Today to get tattoo is not easy like  past time, we use a sterille needle, and ink which i must buy for international tattoo supply in us which one this is my job how to make a tattoo with a high quality procedure. If you want see a part of my portfolio you can click my friendster page.

lenders.name: Aimee
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Nicole & Gerry
lenders.loan_because: we want to enable people who are economically less forunate to realize their dreams and fulfill their entrepreneurial aspirations!
lenders.occupational_info: Life coaches and business consultants.

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: I want someone to have a chance to better their life and their childrens lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am first a Mom and grandmother.
